item.title: leetcode 11. Container With Most Water (two pointer)
item.description: Given n non-negative integers a1, a2, ..., an, where each represents a point at coordinate (i, ai). n vertical lines are drawn such that the two endpoints of line i is at (i, ai) and (i, 0). Find two lines, which together with x-axis forms a container, such that the container contains the most water. Note: You may not slant the container and n is at least 2. 题意：n条竖直的线段 (i,0)->(i,a[i]),从中选2条，和x轴共同组成一个开口的容器，问容器的最大面积。
